statements.select: SELECT * FROM ProduceOtherExitMaterial WHERE ((ProduceOtherExitMaterialDate>=#startdate# OR #startdate# IS NULL) AND (ProduceOtherExitMaterialDate<=#enddate# OR #enddate# IS NULL)) AND (SupplierId IN (SELECT SupplierId FROM Supplier WHERE ((Id>=#sid1# OR #sid1# IS null) AND (Id<=#sid2# OR #sid2# IS NULL)))) and ProduceOtherExitMaterialId in (select ProduceOtherExitMaterialId from ProduceOtherExitDetail where productid in(select productid from product where (Id>=#StartpId# or #StartpId# is null) and (Id<=#EndpId# or #EndpId# is null)))
